creator: peter@hrastnik.at
text:
encodeURL appends ";jsessionid=something" to the given URL (e.g.
response.encodeURL(test.jsp) results in "test.jsp;jsessionid=something").
The Apache webserver is responding with a 404 error, though test.jsp exists and
is accessible without ";jsessionid=something".
I know, this is correct according to the specs, but it means you can't use the
recommended apache-tomcat combination if want URL Rewriting instead of cookies
to track sessions.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 1388 ***
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
